name: Rabbit Roamers
description: Have you ever wanted to be a rabbit in VR? Im sure you haven't so try out Rabbit Roamers! Rabbit Roamers is a Gorilla Tag Locomotion styled game! In this game you can roam around with friends, Go rock climbing, Do parkour and do a whole lot more in Rabbit Roamers!  So I hope you decide to roam around in Rabbit Roamers!
